reviews.review: Очень классная и затягивающая игра. В этой игре больше всего головоломок от сообщества, чем от игры. В игре можно делать свои головоломки без сюжета под номером 00. там есть кооператив, но против друг-друга играть нельзя, и игроков максимально только 2. А так игра хорошая, советую.
Arkadaşla daha müq tek kişilikde güzel

El juego está muy logrado. La historia engancha con el anterior a la perfección...
Buena mecánica de juego, gran calidad gráfica y buenísima ambientación y diálogos.
이런 명작을 이 가격에 플레이해도 되는 건가....? 진심 시간이 지나도 여전히 갓겜.

Where do I even start? First of all the story is awesome and can be replayed so much without loosing its value. The puzzles are difficult but not too difficult to make it infuriating, once you finish a really hard puzzle you feel so much accomplishment. The co-op is one of the best co-op games I have ever played, it has a great story and actually feels like its meant to be a part of the game instead of just some afterthought. There are community made maps for single player and co-op, there are so many well made community maps that feel like they were produced by a game studio. You can even make your own map if you wanted to. SOOO many easter eggs and secrets in this game its unreal. There are barely any glitches that you can just run into during game play. Even the title screen changes depending on where you are in the game. The community for this game is insane. Speedrunning this game is insane, if you somehow feel like you are getting bored of this game, then try speedrunning it. This is honestly one of the best games i have ever played. Oh and i forgot to mention... THE CUSTOM MODS FOR THIS GAME IS INSANE!!!! If you have this game you should really consider downloading the mods for this game, some even just straight up make a whole new game with new mechanics and a whole story with new characters and its just the coolest thing ever, examples are: Portal Stories Mel, Portal Reloaded and Aperture Tag just to name a tiny amount of them. This game is perhaps one of, if not my most favourite game of all time. 

TL;DR : Portal 2 is good game, lots to do, 10/10

good plot + fun/unique gameplay = good game

好玩，谜题设计水准颇高；和第一代相比，除了内容长度的提升，也开始出现与地图场景高度融合的关卡。非常佩服制作组对传送机制的开发程度之深，在此之上的剧情也非常有意思（虽然因为英文大部分细节都未领会，所以又花大量时间看b站视频）。难以想象质量和完成度如此之高的游戏是在10多年前完成的。

ps：多人也非常好玩，推荐推荐！！！
enjoyed it alot, had a lot of good memories come back from this game. achievement hunting is very fun as well!

Por primera vez lo jugué pirata cuando tenía 10/11 años, no entendía nada porque nunca jugué al portal 1 pero les digo que ame tanto este juego que lo volví a jugar por 2da vez, hoy que tengo 15 años volví a jugar portal 2 por 3ra vez y compre el portal 1, jugué primero el 1 y luego el 2, entendí cosas que no entendía, vi cosas que no había visto, sentí cosas que no había sentido antes, este juego es una maravilla, mas que puzles y hacerte pensar, es amor por parte de los desarrolladores, no hay mucho que decir, simplemente es Portal :). 10/10
10/10 game love the portal franchise definitely think the second one is better than the first one
